variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a missense mutation in the protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line expressing wild-type ATM and the variant NM_000047.5:c.6362C>T.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression levels were higher for the variant NM_000047.5:c.6362C>T compared to wild-type ATM.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type ATM cDNA was used as a positive control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: T-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels similar to wild-type ATM.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels significantly higher than wild-type ATM.
